head.description: {{ProdFullName}} adds fast and accurate text search capabilities to {{ProgLang}} applications, supporting multiple document formats.

header.title: Find text in business documents
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides powerful and flexible search functionality for documents. Easily integrate text search into {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust search and indexing library that enables fast text retrieval in documents. It supports over 70 file formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, ensuring precise and efficient searches.

more_features.title: Advanced search capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances document search efficiency by indexing over 70 file formats. Optimize content retrieval with advanced search techniques.

feature_1.title: Comprehensive text search
feature_1.content: Extract and locate text in popular document formats, such as PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, and presentations. Supports fuzzy search, homophones, and wildcard queries.

feature_2.title: Optimized indexing for performance
feature_2.content: Accelerate searches by creating reusable indexes. Enhances speed and efficiency when working with large document collections.

feature_3.title: Multi-language support
feature_3.content: Search through documents in over 80 languages. Recognizes keyboard layouts and word variations for better accuracy.

feature_4.title: Customizable search options
feature_4.content: Fine-tune search results with filters, regular expressions, case sensitivity, and other flexible settings.

formats.title: Search in diverse document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 70 file types, allowing efficient text search across various office and business documents.

operations.title: Key functionalities
operations.description: Perform fast and precise text searches across documents.
